title: Nozomi Transformation Plan
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Ooh~! Nozomi, you look good with colored extensions~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, this is my first time putting on this kind of thing, it’s interesting<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Since you’re already like that, can Ai try putting some fake eyelashes just on the corner of your eyes? Then Ai can put some glitter on them. They will be all sparkly and cute♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’ll leave everything to you today, Ai-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yaaay~~! You’re so fun to mess around with, Nozomi, Ai is really into it now~.  Let’s also get your nails done♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>The girl in the mirror looks like a completely different person now….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hey, let’s show everyone in μ’s this look. Won’t it surprise them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I hope Elicchi doesn’t faint….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh? If Eli faints, we can do her makeup as much as we want, though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That’s a nice idea! Then, let’s make it so flashy that Elicchi faints♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
